properties: Anti-inflammatory
Antibacterial

Anti-inflammatory
Antipyretic

name: Arali
properties: Ornamental plant
Toxic if ingested
Contains cardiac glycosides
A highly toxic ornamental shrub with beautiful flowers, containing cardiac glycosides with potential medicinal applications under strict supervision.

Anti-inflammatory

properties: Rich in protein
High fiber

properties: Memory enhancer
